overview:
Investment Manager (ICT) with Industrifonden, a Swedish venture capital fund with approx 400 MEUR under management.

Entrepreneur, executive and venture capitalist with 20+ years of experience from building and developing ideas and organisations in ICT/TIME sectors; traditional media (radio, television), on-line media (online-advertising, web performance management, digital music, gaming) and entertainment (music, live entertainment, etc).

Long experience of both upstarts and large media companies (a o as CEO of MTG Modern Times Group subsidiary Nordic Artist AB) and venture financing. Served as representative of larger shareholders on the nomination committees for two major listed Swedish companies.

Recent investments include:

  • Burt AB (www.burtcorp.com); advertising analytics
  • Apica AB (www.apicasystem.com); web performance management
